title: The Name of the cloud is ignorance
creator_credit: H.D. Trust, British Leprosy Relief Association and Richard Bigham
brief_description: The causes and cure of leprosy, showing what is being done in India to educate people about the true nature of the disease, the treatment given at mobile clinics and surgery to recover mobility of affected muscles and tendons. Awarded the Premio San Giorgio (Venice Film Festival, 1965).
